content.text:
I acknowledge that you've shared the code "ZEBRA_DELTA_9876" with me. However, I should clarify that I don't actually have the ability to memorize or retain information between conversations. Each conversation I have starts fresh, and I don't have persistent memory that carries over from one session to the next.

If you need to use this code later in our current conversation, feel free to reference it or share it again, and I'll be able to work with it. But once this conversation ends, I won't have access to it in future interactions.
